name: places/ChIJf-JE3ehZwokRXgoRYPxLMhA
formattedAddress: 33 Hudson Yards, New York, NY 10001, USA
adrFormatAddress: 33 Hudson Yards, New York, NY 10001, USA

editorialSummary.text: Sleek rooms & suites in an upscale hotel with dining, a spa & a 60,000 sq ft gym, plus river views.

originalText.text: We are regularly in NYC, and like to try different hotel but this one is my new favorite! Really loved everything about this hotel, great location around Hudson yards, and very close to a 7 subway station which allows for easy access to other subway lines! The rooms were absolutely stunning, the amenities were such a great touch and being able to use the gym facilities as a hotel guest was such a great perk! The entire hotel staff are SUPER nice and really accommodating, and my husband and I agree we will be back!

text.text: We are regularly in NYC, and like to try different hotel but this one is my new favorite! Really loved everything about this hotel, great location around Hudson yards, and very close to a 7 subway station which allows for easy access to other subway lines! The rooms were absolutely stunning, the amenities were such a great touch and being able to use the gym facilities as a hotel guest was such a great perk! The entire hotel staff are SUPER nice and really accommodating, and my husband and I agree we will be back!

originalText.text: Great hotel. The location is pretty prime, Hudson yards is probably the nicest part of New York right now. It’s nice to have the private drive for ride shares and loading/unloading with bags. The rooms are phenomenal and everything is DEAD silent. You hear nothing in the hallways and no traffic noise or anything. Bed and bath products and shower are great, room completely blacks out. Heads up to families - the pools look great but no kids allowed. It’s not really a family vibe here, its more chic athletic single vibes, but the private drive and proximity to things make it family friendly and they gave my son a toy and bag at check-in, we never felt uncomfortable. Staff were great, casual. Top of my list in NY.

Staff were great, casual. Top of my list in NY.

originalText.text: An amazing hotel all around! From the incredible views to the modern and clean rooms to the friendly and helpful staff, this is one of the best hotels I’ve ever stayed at. The view comes with no noise due to double glazed windows, and let me tell you, watching the sunrise from the room was unbelievable. The room service was delicious and quick, the cleaning staff were amazing(they saw that I was running low on toothpaste and left me a new mini one in the bathroom). Highly recommend!

text.text: An amazing hotel all around! From the incredible views to the modern and clean rooms to the friendly and helpful staff, this is one of the best hotels I’ve ever stayed at. The view comes with no noise due to double glazed windows, and let me tell you, watching the sunrise from the room was unbelievable. The room service was delicious and quick, the cleaning staff were amazing(they saw that I was running low on toothpaste and left me a new mini one in the bathroom). Highly recommend!

originalText.text: The hotel is nice but in-room dining was 30 minutes late twice (on top of a 30 min stated delivery) - inconvenient if you have plans. Seems like a staffing issue. Also massages were fully booked for several days, we had to go to the four seasons who had availability next day.

text.text: The hotel is nice but in-room dining was 30 minutes late twice (on top of a 30 min stated delivery) - inconvenient if you have plans. Seems like a staffing issue. Also massages were fully booked for several days, we had to go to the four seasons who had availability next day.

originalText.text:
Equinox claims to be a quiet oasis but there is the sound of slamming doors everywhere. I asked the staff multiple times if they could please stop slamming doors next to our room as they were cleaning and restocking but it continued. Every time a door slammed our entire room rattled. Even in the Spa, I was sitting drinking tea in the quiet room and one of the attendants kept coming in and out letting the door behind her slam shut. I had to leave and go back to my room. I also think that the room itself also needs more flat surface space to lay personal items on.

The room service menu was outstanding and the gym was wonderful!!
